name: uniform
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 a particular set of clothes that has to be worn by the members of the same organization or group of people: military/school uniform a nurse's uniform I love a man in uniform! Compare
mufti (CLOTHES)
[ C ] a type of clothes that is connected with a particular group of people: Photographs show him wearing the T-shirt and ripped jeans that were the student's uniform of the time.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was pictured as a soldier in full uniform.She recalled the humiliation of exchanging her clothes for the prison uniform.I never wear grey because it reminds me of my school uniform.He thinks that wearing school uniform depersonalizes children.I feel so drab in this grey uniform.
